post.body: I cooked for 18 Christmas day. Ugh. Lol
You sure are quiet today. Did you party too much? LOL Hope you had a great time.
oops, worshipper.
To answer you question in your profile, I am a worshiper. Happy New Year.
I love the Lord, a mother of 2 teenagers, and an aide in kindergarten. Married to one man.
I just looked at your page. Love your VT border. My daughter is a student at VT and loves it. I live in Southwest VA also.
be safe and have a great time. Happy new year
The gift of being with family and friends and everyone was fairly healthy. Our parents are still living. Lots of love. You?
Thanks for the info. I want to see that movie also. Guess it will be next weekend now.
No, I live in VA.
I'm a teacher's aide. I work in kindergarten.
Sorry you have to return too. They say all good things have to come to an end. I go back in one week. UGH
Happy Birthday!!!
My husband is so quiet that sometimes I wonder if he has a voice. Seriously, LOL LOL!!
My dad has really gone down. His mind is getting worse all the time. My mother-in-law is the same. Sad, breaks my heart.
I agree with Aristotle.
I want to win the lottery. Is that too much to ask for in 2009?
A special friend told me on several occasions..live each day as if you have no regrets. HAPPY NEW YEAR twitters.
It isn't always about how fast time passes, but what we do with the time we have. Spend it wisely.
Husband goes back to work after being off a week. It was nice having him around for several days. Hard to get the family together sometimes
